titleStmt.title: Several proposals offered (by a friend to peace and truth) to the serious consideration to the keepers of the liberties of the people of England, in reference to a settlement of peace and truth in this nation. As also a true narrative in short is chiefly to make known two or three sums of money concealed: and many of the actings of the proposers, Samuel Duncon, late of Ipswich in Suffolk, are declared. From the year 1640. to the year 1652.
titleStmt.author: Duncon, Samuel.

notesStmt.note: Text starts on verso of titlepage.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
